    • byIds

      Many<UserAuth> byIds(String... userIds)

      Get public user data

      Note,
      use only up to 300 ids at a time for full error handling.
      If more than 300 ids are provided, additional requests will be made as needed and, for any successful response, the results are concatenated into the initial response stream.

      Specified by:
      byIds in interface UsersApi
      Parameters:
      userIds - A list of up to 300 user ids

    • byIds

      Many<UserAuth> byIds(Collection<String> userIds)

      Get public user data

      Note,
      use only up to 300 ids at a time for full error handling.
      If more than 300 ids are provided, additional requests will be made as needed and, for any successful response, the results are concatenated into the initial response stream.

      Specified by:
      byIds in interface UsersApi
      Parameters:
      userIds - A list of up to 300 user ids

    • autocompleteNames

      Many<String> autocompleteNames(String term, boolean friend)
      Autocomplete names given the starting 3 or more characters of a username
      Parameters:
      term - The beginning of a username >= 3 characters
      friend - If true, returns followed players matching term if any, else returns other players.

    • autocompleteUsers

      Many<UserStatus> autocompleteUsers(String term, boolean friend)
      Autocomplete names given the starting 3 or more characters of a username
      Parameters:
      term - The beginning of a username >= 3 characters
      friend - If true, returns followed players matching term if any, else returns other players.
